SELECT PAGE_NM AS pageNm , DEPTH1 AS depth1 , DEPTH2 AS depth2 , DEPTH3 AS depth3 , MENU_NM AS menuNm , HEADER_YN AS headerYn , CONTENTPAGE_YN AS contentpageYn , LINK AS link , TARGET AS target , CONTENT_ID AS contentID , (SELECT NTT_SJ FROM COMTNBBS b WHERE BBS_ID='BBSMSTR_000000000002' AND m.CONTENT_ID = b.NTT_ID LIMIT 1) AS nttSj , (SELECT NTT_CN FROM COMTNBBS b WHERE BBS_ID='BBSMSTR_000000000002' AND m.CONTENT_ID = b.NTT_ID LIMIT 1) AS nttCn FROM MENUINFOLIST m WHERE 1=1 AND m.PAGE_NM = #{pageNm}
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MENUINFOLIST WHERE 1=1 AND PAGE_NM = #{pageNm}

SELECT m.PAGE_NM AS pageNm , m.DEPTH1 AS depth1 , m.DEPTH2 AS depth2 , m.DEPTH3 AS depth3 , m.MENU_NM AS menuNm , m.HEADER_YN AS headerYn , m.CONTENTPAGE_YN AS contentpageYn , m.LINK AS link , m.TARGET AS target , m.CONTENT_ID AS contentId FROM MENUINFOLIST m LEFT JOIN COMTNBBS b ON b.BBS_ID = 'BBSMSTR_000000000002' WHERE m.CONTENTPAGE_YN ='Y' AND (m.CONTENT_ID IS NULL OR m.CONTENT_ID = 0) AND b.USE_AT = 'Y'

SELECT NTT_ID AS nttId, NTT_SJ AS nttJs, NTT_CN AS nttCn FROM COMTNBBS WHERE BBS_ID = 'BBSMSTR_000000000002' AND NTT_ID NOT IN ( SELECT CONTENT_ID FROM MENUINFOLIST WHERE CONTENTPAGE_YN ='Y' AND (CONTENT_ID IS NOT NULL AND CONTENT_ID != 0) ) AND USE_AT = 'Y'

SELECT POPUP_ID, POPUP_SJ_NM, FILE_URL, POPUP_DISPLAY_PAGE, POPUP_IMAGE, POPUP_HTML, POPUP_WIDTH_SIZE, POPUP_VRTICL_SIZE, STOPVEW_SETUP_AT, DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM COMTNPOPUPMANAGE WHERE 1=1 AND NTCE_AT = 'Y' AND POPUP_DISPLAY_PAGE = #{pageNm} ORDER BY LAST_UPDT_PNTTM DESC LIMIT 3
